statusLine.command: input=$(cat); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); printf '%d%% context | ' "$pct"; fi; printf '%s in %s' "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name')" "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir' | sed 's|^/Users/david|~|')"
